Title: Steve the Virgin
Writer: Nick Kroll (created by), Andrew Goldberg (created by), Mark Levin (created by), Jennifer Flackett (created by), Joe Wengert
Actors: Fred Armisen, Neil Casey, Jessi Klein, Jak Knight
Plot: Coach Steve finally gets his chance to do sex on a lady, Nick and Andrew go on a double date, and Jessi's rebellious streak leads to big trouble.
